headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Compete for Triple Rewards on All Land Races
content:
If you’re still in control, you’re simply not going fast enough. It’s one of the contradictions and dangers that lies at the heart of competitive racing. Luckily for you, the risk is rewarded in kind: all Rockstar Created Land Races are paying out 3X GTA$ and RP, all week long.

Jump into a competitive Series via the boot menu or with the Quick Join option on your iFruit.
